title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu within the Java perspective appears enabled consistently, despite configuring 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled. Even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification', the 'Build' menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. I believe this is incorrect.
EB: The 'Build' action should reflect the preference set in Preferences > Workbench. If 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' is selected, the 'Build' option should be disabled in the Java popup menus accordingly.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select 'Perform build automatically on resource modification'.
4. Verify the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective to confirm the 'Build' action is disabled as per the preference setting.
